entry.title: $2700 // NO FEE Adorable Apartment in Prime Location
entry.content:
An adorable and beautifully decorated apartment in Prospect Lefferts Gardens, Brooklyn. Steps from the botanical gardens, Prospect Park, and the express Q train that reaches Manhattan in 15 minutes. The apartment comes furnished with a fully stocked kitchen, iron, hairdryer, fresh linens and towels, memory foam mattress, WiFi, TV with Chromecast - essentially everything you would need to move in. The apartment is exceptionally quite, flooded with sunlight, spacious, and provides a reprieve from fast paced NYC. Cats, dogs, and children are welcome.

NO BROKERS FEE - first month rent and one month security deposit to move in. The apartment is available starting in November for a 8-12 month rental with option to extend. Rent is adjusted to incentivize longer term rental - see below.

8 months: $2900 per month
10 months: $2800 per month
12 months or more: $2700 per month
